remarks.format: ## Remarks 當下列任一情形發生時， 方法會傳回 `true`：The method returns `true` when one of the following is true: - `algorithm` 參數是 ，而且建構函式中所指定 X.509 憑證之公開金鑰的類型不是 。The `algorithm` parameter is and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type . - `algorithm` 參數是 、、 或 ，而且建構函式中所指定 X.509 憑證之公開金鑰的類型不是 。The `algorithm` parameter is , , or and the public key for the X.509 certificate specified in the constructor is of type .
